com.dp16.dynamicrunninginghent.DataProvider

Class AndroidWearProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • android.app.Service
          • com.google.android.gms.wearable.WearableListenerService
            • com.dp16.dynamicrunninginghent.DataProvider.AndroidWearProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, DataProvider, EventListener, EventPublisher, com.google.android.gms.common.api.GoogleApiClient.ConnectionCallbacks, com.google.android.gms.common.api.GoogleApiClient.OnConnectionFailedListener, com.google.android.gms.wearable.CapabilityApi.CapabilityListener, com.google.android.gms.wearable.ChannelApi.ChannelListener, com.google.android.gms.wearable.DataApi.DataListener, com.google.android.gms.wearable.MessageApi.MessageListener, com.google.android.gms.wearable.NodeApi.NodeListener

    public class AndroidWearProvider
extends com.google.android.gms.wearable.WearableListenerService
implements EventListener, DataProvider, com.google.android.gms.common.api.GoogleApiClient.ConnectionCallbacks, com.google.android.gms.common.api.GoogleApiClient.OnConnectionFailedListener, EventPublisher
    This dataprovider offers an interface with an android wearable via bluetooth. It sends and receives messages from the android wear device. The received message contains heartrates or requests for the state of the mobile app. The sent messages are updates providing data to be displayed on the wearable. Created by Stiaan on 7/03/2017.
